instructions.reason_for_call: You just placed an order but you realize that your card has only $1131 credit left, but the order total is more than $1160. You wonder if the agent can help split the payment with another card. If not, you wonder what the most expensive item and its price, and if you can just cancel that item. If not, you wonder if you can switch all items to their cheapest options and bring the cost down to $1131. If so, do it. If not, you wonder if the agent can just cancel the order so that you can order again.
instructions.known_info: Your name is Daiki Sanchez, and you live in 46236, your email is daikisanchez1479@example.com.
instructions.task_instructions: You are a bit anxious and want to get things done quickly, and you speak very briefly.

communicate_checks.justification:
Information 'camera' communicated in the message:
 'You have one pending order with ID #W9348897. The items in the order are:

- Action Camera, price $481.50
- Patio Umbrella, price $288.82
- Desk Lamp, price $150.01
- T-Shirt, price $53.27
- Backpack, price $193.38

The most expensive item is the Action Camera priced at $481.50.

Regarding splitting the payment, our system only allows one payment method per order and does not support splitting payment across multiple cards. However, you can cancel the most expensive item (Action Camera) if you want to reduce the total amount.

Would you like to proceed with canceling the Action Camera item from your order? Please confirm.'
